Text: You posted it so it must be worth downloading! Thanks !

Hey 80z as ever thanks for the brilliant uploads. Was wondering if you had either of these two rarities, Landscape - Manhattan Boogie Woogie or Cabaret Voltaire - Groovy Laidback and Nasty both proving hard to track down, used to have both on cassette back in the day....

Man, this brings back the memories! I am in Toronto and Carol Pope is still revered in this city. 80zforever, you must be from the area, no, given all your 80s uploads from Toronto bands?

Thanks!
Estlin, as a matter of fact no, I am in the west coast, so go Canucks Go! go Canucks Go!, and in the meantime you know that Leafs suck right? lol

jeyeasus!! buddy your whole pages of 80's OMG i turned 13 in 1980 so my whole teenage years are the 80's well i'm going to have fun looking around for songs i have lost touch with.. ohhh YEAH!!!

sorry to post this here.. but it's the last torrent at time of writing! thanks a million i'm off to explore:)
bubanee happy exploring and thx for the message!

Hiya Dan, cheers for another great upload. I wonder if the Rough Trade record label took its name from this band?!!
Just in case you miss my email, I've uploaded some new torrents finally. There's a great Documentary DVD called Souvenir - The OMD story on there, highly recommended mate.
